name: Blue Tiger
description:
Mr. James Klueso reaches out to us in a holographic message. There was a bank heist in the past days and from the safe, his precious and beloved Blue Tiger jewel has been stolen. It's our duty to wrap up this investigation and find the gem.

The game was made for Global Game Jam 2021 within 72 hours (yep the contest is just 48 hours, we know that). This was a test for our news team, to see how we can collaborate with each other. Now we can start work on NeonCode 2. 

Also, this story will be part of the game as a secondary mission or kinda

Credits: 
Story and Dialogs: Gábor Bocsi
Programming: László Molnár
Level Design + Programming: Zsolt Várady


Patreon No More Neon
